text:
A college student committed suicide by jumping in front of a train here on Monday night.

Police said that P. Ebenezer, a third-year B.Com. student from EB Colony in Thiyagaraja Nagar in Palayamkottai, had failed in a couple of subjects.

Upset over this, he reportedly jumped in front of a train even as it was crossing Thiyagaraja Nagar Tangedco office on Monday night. Government Railway Police recovered the body and sent it to Tirunelveli Medical College Hospital for post-mortem.
title: College student jumps before train, dies
